name: Association of Personal Trainers
tag_list: personal-trainer, fitness-trainer, sports-management, online-directory, sports-promotion, personal-trainer-website
overview:
Association of Personal Trainers is a globally recognised sports and fitness accreditation and marketing specialists.

We provide an elite membership with full accreditation for all types of sports and fitness professionals.

As part of the package you receive your own membership page where you can upload videos, text, pictures, opening times ect. This page will then undergo various internet marketing strategies to appear on the search engines and social media platforms so that you are in front of the majority of your audience.

We charge only £1 a month for this high quality elite service to help keep costs low and manageable.
